data.name: 0002 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It was never my intention come face-to-face with the club president in this unbearable heat.

data.name: 0003 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But, it'll be trouble if I can't convince him that the unnatural phenomenon wasn't real.

data.name: 0004 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: It's really just you alone, right?

data.name: 0005 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's what I keep telling you.

data.name: 0006 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The president kept randomly checking my back.

data.name: 0007 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I can't get the information I need soon, Haruhi will probably get bored and come here.

data.name: 0008 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Of course, I'm going to try to get him to give me some kind of clue to prove the phenomenon isn't real.

data.name: 0009 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I'm sorry to ask again, but you are alone, right?

data.name: 0010 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah. Do you see anyone else around?

data.name: 0011 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Well I wouldn't want to say something unscientific about how just because I can't see something doesn't mean something isn't there, but…

data.name: 0012 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: …… Where's your Miss Brigade Leader?

data.name: 0013 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Did Haruhi do something?

data.name: 0014 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't even have to go as far as asking, it seems.

data.name: 0015 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Like hiding in your shadow, or listening in from the other side of the door.

data.name: 0016 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well I don't think she's a ninja, but well, it can't be helped.

data.name: 0017 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Thinking of Haruhi in such a way is in line with her actions after all.

data.name: 0018 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You don't need to worry about that. She's headed to the scene of the phenomenon.

data.name: 0019 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I see. That puts me a little at ease at least. You seem somewhat down to Earth.

data.name: 0020 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I understand why he's so cautious after all. I can even sympathise with him.

data.name: 0021 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's hard to call him unreasonable when he went through what he did to have his new computer stolen.

data.name: 0022 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Anyway, what brings our club neighour here?

data.name: 0023 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's about the so-called phenomena you Computer Research guys all experienced.

data.name: 0024 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'd like to ask for a few more details.

data.name: 0025 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: More details, hmm……

data.name: 0026 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'd appreciate it if you didn't look at me with such a blatantly suspicious gaze.

data.name: 0027 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Point that gaze at our beloved brigade chief, not at me.

data.name: 0028 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That would be Haruhi getting what she deserves.

data.name: 0029 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, I'd rather anything than for that to cause trouble to the rest of the brigade.

data.name: 0030 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: What are you planning to do, having heard about them from us?

data.name: 0031 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm trying to prevent our brigade chief from causing you guys any more trouble.

data.name: 0032 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I thought I'd take some advanced measures.

data.name: 0033 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: …… Can I really believe what you're saying?

data.name: 0034 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Fair enough, it's not something anyone would naturally believe straight away.

data.name: 0035 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: From his point of view, I'm an accomplice of our theft incident.

data.name: 0036 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: You won't cause us any trouble?

data.name: 0037 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, neither directly or indirectly.

data.name: 0038 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: What do you mean, "indirectly"?

data.name: 0039 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't worry about that, that's something else.

data.name: 0040 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If Haruhi gets in a weird mood and breaks the balance of this room…

data.name: 0041 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He might get captured by another giant cave cricket for all I know.

data.name: 0042 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't want him to get mixed up in anything like that again. Not just for his benefit, but I want to humbly excuse myself from being part of the rescue drama.

data.name: 0043 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Okay, fine. I don't want to have any more involvement with your brigade chief for now.

data.name: 0044 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right……

data.name: 0045 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He said "for now", so does that mean this guy is looking for something with Haruhi at some point?

data.name: 0046 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Hey, tell him your experience.

data.name: 0048 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: What do you want me to tell you?

data.name: 0049 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Would you mind telling me about your experience from beginning to end again?

data.name: 0050 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Again? Well, whatever.

data.name: 0051 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: It was when I was walking around and putting up posters.

data.name: 0052 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Posters?

data.name: 0053 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Yeah. Our club was in charge of putting up posters about water conservation.

data.name: 0054 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: We often don't have enough water in the summer, you know?

data.name: 0055 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right. There's not enough water, so every year you raise awareness telling people to save water.

data.name: 0056 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Unfortunately, a lot of students aren't aware about saving water.

data.name: 0057 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: We created the posters on request from the student council.

data.name: 0058 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see……

data.name: 0059 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe it was stupid of me to ask him to go through the story from beginning to end.

data.name: 0060 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He's started going on about ecology.

data.name: 0061 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I need him to get to the point.

data.name: 0063 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Basically, you had your experience when putting up posters, right?

data.name: 0064 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: That's right. It was when I was walking around, putting them up in the corridors and the class notice boards.

data.name: 0065 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I somehow fell into a weird sensation.

data.name: 0066 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A weird sensation?

data.name: 0067 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: It was that, mysteriously, the corridor felt longer than usual. Impossible, right?

data.name: 0068 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't want to admit it, but it's possible. For now I'll just accept it and move on.

data.name: 0069 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I suppose you're right. By the way, where were you?

data.name: 0070 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: The corridor where class 1-9 is. It leads to a dead end, right?

data.name: 0071 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right, I understand.

data.name: 0072 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi is in class 1-9. I've had to drag my feet over there plenty of times.

data.name: 0073 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I was thinking it was weird, but I kept putting up the posters until I realised.

data.name: 0074 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I must've been confused beacuse of staying up all night at school, is what I thought.

data.name: 0075 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's a totally understandable reaction.

data.name: 0076 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I thought it was ridiculous and laughed about it while finishing putting up the posters, but when I turned around……

data.name: 0077 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: It was right infront of my eyes.

data.name: 0078 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Class 1-10.

data.name: 0079 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is that so……

data.name: 0080 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: There are only 9 classes in our first year, right?

data.name: 0081 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah. There's no class 10 classroom. You weren't mistaking it for another room?

data.name: 0082 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I also thought I was mistaking it.

data.name: 0083 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: But, I saw it there clearly…… A 1-10 plate over the door.

data.name: 0085 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Really……

data.name: 0086 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If this unnatural phenomenon were caused by Haruhi……

data.name: 0087 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Then it should be different to what I saw.

data.name: 0088 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: When did this happen?

data.name: 0089 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I don't remember exactly, but it was a few days ago.

data.name: 0090 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In other words, it was before Taniguchi phoned me about the unnatural phenomena.

data.name: 0091 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Once Haruhi heard the members of the computer research society had experienced these unnatural phenomena…

data.name: 0092 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: … Thats when she got interested…… If she was going to have an influence, it would be after that, wouldn't it?

data.name: 0093 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This club member had their experience earlier than that, so they were probably just mistaken, right?

data.name: 0094 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Hey, take a look at the poster. It's a pretty cool design, isn't it?

data.name: 0095 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The poster he was proudly showing me was eye-catching at a glance.

data.name: 0096 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe the design was too intricate because it was hard to decipher what was even written.

data.name: 0097 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What does this say?

data.name: 0098 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: It says H2O, the chemical symbols for water.

data.name: 0099 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, now you mention it, I can see it.

data.name: 0100 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: The characters for water conservation are pretty common, so I tried to twist it.

data.name: 0101 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I want to ask what the point is of a poster so incomprehensible that you need to ask for an explanation.

data.name: 0102 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I get the impression they were so distracted by the design of the characters, that they completely missed the core purpose.

data.name: 0103 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Is something wrong?

data.name: 0104 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, just……

data.name: 0105 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You say "H2O" is written, but…… isn't this the wrong character?

data.name: 0106 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They probably didn't notice because they were so focussed on the design.

data.name: 0107 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe I should point it out……?

data.name: 0108 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I point out the mistake, they should owe me a favor in return.

data.name: 0109 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Isn't this the wrong character?

data.name: 0110 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Huh, what about it is wrong?

data.name: 0111 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The 2 looks out of shape, so it's hard to read.

data.name: 0112 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Ah, you're right, it's wrong!

data.name: 0113 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Was I overstepping my authority there?

data.name: 0114 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Not at all. It's a great help.

data.name: 0115 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: The computer research society's reputation would've been ruined!

data.name: 0116 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I'd better collect them up and redo them…… I'm truly grateful.

data.name: 0117 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's nothing.

data.name: 0118 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: "Misprint on a poster", huh……

data.name: 0119 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If this benefits me later, I'm not going to complain.

data.name: 0120 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I keep interjecting like this, I'll end up annoying them, though.

data.name: 0121 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So then, did you not enter the 1-10 classroom?

data.name: 0122 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Hm, yeah. I didn't exactly have any reason to. I was tired so I went straight back.

data.name: 0123 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He could leave……? That's completely different to my experience then.

data.name: 0124 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Was the situation he encountered was much less severe than mine then?

data.name: 0125 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, is that the general situation with your unnatural experience?

data.name: 0126 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Yeah, that's all there was to it. It was just creepy.

data.name: 0127 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thank you for telling me about it.

data.name: 0128 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I don't know if it'll be helpful to you.

data.name: 0129 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Well whatever, that's how it was.

data.name: 0130 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thank you very much.

data.name: 0131 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Is your brigade chief going to be satisfied now, having heard all that?

data.name: 0132 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Honestly, I'd be surprised if she'd be satisfied that easily.

data.name: 0133 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Right…… Is there anything else you want to ask?

data.name: 0134 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let me see…

data.name: 0135 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They seem to be acting quite cooperatively. While I'm here I might as well ask some things.

data.name: 0136 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why is your society staying over at school?

data.name: 0137 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: And I mean doing all-nighters.

data.name: 0138 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Yes…… We're in the middle of developing a fairly big program.

data.name: 0139 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A computer program?

data.name: 0140 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: We are the computer research society, you know. We need something to show for the school festival.

data.name: 0141 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So that's why you're spending your summer holiday together at school…… What kind of program?

data.name: 0142 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I can't tell you that just yet.

data.name: 0143 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Well, you'd better just look forward to when it's done!

data.name: 0144 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Especially, a part that I want your Miss Brigade Leader to look forward to! Hehehe……

data.name: 0145 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right……

data.name: 0146 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Why on Earth do the club president's words sound so suggestive?

data.name: 0147 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just earlier too, he used an expression which packs some reasonable implications when he said "for now."

data.name: 0148 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You wouldn't expect him to want to have anything to do with Haruhi, so what is he thinking?

data.name: 0149 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Will your club be presenting something?

data.name: 0150 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh? At the school festival?

data.name: 0151 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I don't know what you're going to be doing, but surely you're more or less doing something, right?

data.name: 0152 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Looking as an outsider, do we look like we're going to be presenting something?

data.name: 0153 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I guess not…… Sorry.

data.name: 0154 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You'll make me upset if you say it like that.

data.name: 0155 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Huh, what? That's strange…… Where did it go?

data.name: 0156 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Suddenly the complexion of the club president's face changed.

data.name: 0157 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He got so flustered I thought he'd seen Haruhi. It even made me turn around and check.

data.name: 0158 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: What happened, Prez?

data.name: 0159 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Hey, the memory card with our data on it, it's not with you is it?

data.name: 0160 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: No, I haven't seen it……

data.name: 0161 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: You didn't lose it did you?

data.name: 0162 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Maybe I left it in the computer room……

data.name: 0163 (363.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: If you lost that, all our effort until now will have meant nothing!

data.name: 0164 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Wait wait, if I just calm down I'll remember.

data.name: 0165 (363.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I probably left it behind with my laptop. I'll go check later.

data.name: 0166 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems like some kind of serious situation has occurred.

data.name: 0167 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now's not the time to ask questions.

data.name: 0168 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I'm sorry for taking your time……

data.name: 0171 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh?

data.name: 0172 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I found something dropped outside of the computer research society's clubroom……

data.name: 0173 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Could this be the club president's so called lost memory card?

data.name: 0174 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …… There's nothing written on it about the contents.

data.name: 0175 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll pick it up and have a look, but it just seems like a normal memory card.

data.name: 0176 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm…… it's got "Comp research" written on it.

data.name: 0177 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Should I return this to them?

data.name: 0178 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No, wait a second.

data.name: 0179 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: He told me to look forward to it in such a suggestive manner……

data.name: 0180 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't help but imagine this would really interest Haruhi.

data.name: 0181 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I do think it's the moral thing to do to take lost items to where they belong, but…

data.name: 0182 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In this case, perhaps it would be more humane to use this to divert Haruhi's attention onto something else.

data.name: 0183 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If the school turns into an abnormal space, it'll get the whole neighbourhood involved, after all.

data.name: 0184 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No, even more than that, there's a possibility the whole world could be at risk of collapse, right?

data.name: 0185 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, what should I do……?

data.name: 0186 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess I'll borrow the memory card after all.

data.name: 0187 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I don't divert Haruhi's attention, things will get serious.

data.name: 0188 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I can get Haruhi's attention, the space might settle.

data.name: 0189 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm sorry club president, but this is for the sake of world peace.

data.name: 0190 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If you want it back, you can have it after that, no problem.

data.name: 0191 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'll just borrow this for a bit.

data.name: 0192 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You obtained the "memory card."

data.name: 0193 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If it comes to it, we could use this as a means to confront the computer research society.

data.name: 0194 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm feeling worse and worse for the computer research society, but…

data.name: 0195 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I want to hold off on world-ending events as much as I can, you know?

data.name: 0196 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If we're lucky, Haruhi might completely forget about the new seven mysteries.

data.name: 0197 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …… That would be awful, for sure.

data.name: 0198 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Returning what you find is the moral way of doing things.

data.name: 0199 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …… There's something else dropped here.

data.name: 0200 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I picked it up. It seemed to be a bookmark with "pure heart" written on it.

data.name: 0201 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is this bookmark making fun of me?

data.name: 0202 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I picked up the bookmark that had such perfect timing it wasn't even funny.

data.name: 0203 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's unclear if this is something the club president dropped, and it doesn't seem to be important.

data.name: 0204 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The club president will probably find it himself.

data.name: 0205 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I should leave the memory card where I found it.

data.name: 0206 (363.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm not interested in going out of my way to deliver it, and becoming suspicious.

data.name: 0207 (363.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'll leave the interviewing at that.

data.name: 0208 (363.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Point out typos.

data.name: 0209 (363.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Borrow the memory card.

data.name: 0210 (363.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: I can't do that.
